```jslive { "fakeBrowser": true }
function UnconnectedRecordList({ records, renderItem = record => record.__str__ }) {
    return (
      <ul>
        {records.map(record => <li key={record.id}>{renderItem(record)}</li>).toList()}
      </ul>
    );
}
const RecordList = connectModel(
    // Extract the model class or id from props
    (props) => props.model,
    // Allow passing of a filter function to limit the records
    (model, state, props) => model.selectors.all(state).filter(props.filter || (() => true))
)(UnconnectedRecordList);

<React.Fragment>
    <h3>Questionnaires</h3>
    <RecordList
        model="questionnaire.questionnaire"
        renderItem={record => <Link to={`/${record.id}/`}>{record.__str__}</Link>}
    />
    <Route
        path="/:questionnaireId/"
        render={({ match: { params } }) => (
            <React.Fragment>
                <h3>Setions</h3>
                <RecordList
                  model="questionnaire.section"
                  renderItem={record => <Link to={`/${params.questionnaireId}/${record.id}/`}>{record.__str__}</Link>}
                  filter={(record) => record.questionnaireId === Number(params.questionnaireId)}
                />
            </React.Fragment>
        )}
    />
    <Route
        path="/:questionnaireId/:sectionId/"
        render={({ match: { params } }) => (
            <React.Fragment>
                <h3>Questions</h3>
                <RecordList
                  model="questionnaire.question"
                  filter={(record) => record.section === Number(params.sectionId)}
                />
            </React.Fragment>
        )}
    />
</React.Fragment>
```
